description:
SYNOPSIS :

In this horror thriller game, you incarnate as a little girl who has been recently placed in a foster family.

She has to sneakily escape the house at night to flee from a drunk and violent father. To face the fear of the darkness,  she can take a candle with her but this one could be her last hope but could also cause her loss.

CONTROLS :

Z/Q/S/D  : move

Ctrl : crouch

Shift : run

E/F : interract with objetcs

Left Mouse Click  : turn off the light/ turn it on when you're near to a candle.

DEVELOPMENT TEAM :

We all are students of ETPA Toulouse,  we made this game as the final project for our 2nd year in this school.

Our fabulous team :

  • VASSAL Laura : Main Domain : 3D
    Project Managment /  3D Artist / Support Texturing / Level Art / Support VFX
  • CIEUTAT Emma : Main Domain : 2D
    3D Artist /2D Artist / UX/UI / Narrative Design / Texturing / Level Art
  • MENDIBOURE Nicolas : Main Domain : Gameplay Programming
    Gameplay Programmer / Level Builder / VFX / Tech Art
  • PALETOU Tom : Main Domain : Gameplay Programming
    IA Programmer / Sound Designer / Level Designer
  • EXSHAW Thomas : Main Domain : 3D
    3D Artist /  Animator

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS :

* Click on download button or copy and paste the link

* You arrive in a google drive folder

* Download the folder "662"

* Extract the ZIP file into your Desktop

* Double click on 662.exe

*Now die... of fun !
